tagline.hi: ज्ञान साझा करें, अंक कमाएँ — Mega Knowledge Base Contest
tagline.en: Share knowledge, earn points — Mega Knowledge Base Contest

affiliateNote.hi: नोट: कुछ लिंक affiliate हो सकते हैं—आपके लिए अतिरिक्त लागत नहीं।
affiliateNote.en: Note: Some links may be affiliate links—at no extra cost to you.

submissionsHelp.hi: नीचे Google Sheet से latest submissions auto दिखेंगे।
submissionsHelp.en: Latest submissions will auto-appear from Google Sheet.

submissionsEmpty.hi: अभी कोई data नहीं मिला. कृपया sheetCsvUrl check करें।
submissionsEmpty.en: No data found. Please check sheetCsvUrl.
